obj_elevatorcontroller_slash_Step_0_gml_: \EB* Alright^1, this lift should take us out of here./%
* Now^1, it might take a while^1, so.../%
\E0* Get comfy^1, everyone!/%
* ... Hey^1. Ralsei^1./
* Y'know Lancer's dad..^1. The King?/
* When we meet him..^1. You think we'll have to.../
\EC* ... hurt him?/
* Susie...?/
\E7* I mean, I could EASILY smash him^1, but.../
\E0* You guys^1, I know that's not really your thing./
\E2* You're more about^1, uh^1, grovelling like total losers./%
\E0* And I was thinking..^1. maybe.../
\E6* I could..^1. do that too?/
* Susie!^1? You mean you want to try ACTing...?/
* Uh, well,/
* Susie..^1. We'd be happy if you ACTed with us!/
\E0* And don't worry^1, we'll be there to help you!/
\E6* You won't have to figure it out by yourself./
\EC* ... sure^1, alright./%
\E0* Hey^1. Ralsei./
* Susie?/
* Are you.../
\E6* Still gonna make those^1, uh^1, cakes...?/
* Well^1, will you stop making fun of me?/
\E2* Well^1, if I HAVE TO^1, I guess./
* Then I'll bake you as many as you like^1, alright?/
* Yeah^1, like you can make that many^1, dude./%
\E0* Well^1, this is our stop!/%
\E0* Hey, Kris^1. Wait a sec./%
* Y'know^1, I'm starting to realize./
* It'll be easier for us to get out of here.../
* If we all^1, uh^1, "get along" a little more./
* So, next time we fight an enemy.../%
\EC* If you tell me what to do... I'll listen to you./%

\EC* I'm counting on you^1, OK?/%
